text: sillo hananimkkeseoneun mogina geu isang-ui geos-eulosseo yeleul deusim-e bukkeuleowohaji anh-eusinola. midneun jadeul-eun geugeos(ye)i geudeul-ui junim-eulobuteo on jinliim-eul algo iss-euna bulsinhaneun jadeul-eun “i yelosseo hananimkkeseo wonhaneun geos-i mueos-inga?” lago malhadeola. geubunkkeseoneun geugeos-eulosseo manh-eun salam-eul banghwangke hasigo geugeos-eulosseo manh-eun salam-eul indohasinola. geubunkkeseo geugeos-eulosseo banghwangke hasineun janeun ojig geoyeoghaneun jadeul ppun-ila
